inclusion.criterion: Subject is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 1 other sign of enteric infection present
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has had a previous episode of clinically diagnosed Clostridium difficile within the past 6 months.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has chronic diseases associated with diarrhea (e.g., inflammatory bowel disease or diarrhea predominant irritable bowel syndrome [DIBS])
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has had any therapy with any agent administered for the treatment of Clostridium difficile prior to randomization.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, developed abdominal pain followed by bloating and nausea as well as loose bowel movements. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
